title: High School Mathematical Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Using Intelligent Tutoring Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary algebra and geometry concepts
context.additional_context: Targeting non-degree-seeking adult learners, this course focuses on internalizing high school-level mathematical problem-solving strategies. An LMS-based intelligent system analyzes learner interaction patterns to provide personalized feedback.

learning_goals: Systematic analysis of various types of high school math problems (functions, geometry, statistics) and design of solution procedures
Application of metacognitive strategies to diagnose and correct errors in real-time during problem-solving processes
Achieve over 80% accuracy in solving complex problems through personalized tutorials based on learning data
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
